__e: I'm glad that distance is going away.
When people love each other, and then suddenly one of them Isn't there anymore, it's the distance that hurts. And the distance is the same no matter who's doing the leaving.
They're out of range Range is good
Time and space have parted us, but I reach out across that distance to that same wide-eyed boy and ask him to believe me once more.
All I know is, we got to keep putting ten steps between us and them.
The eyes should not be closed to each other.
I'll end this distance between us, I swear.
But when I come to a full stop, I hope you will understand that the distance between us is not as great as it seems.
